text: Kintu Moi tumikhan logote etu bhirodh kori ase: Tumikhan mon biya paile bhi Jezebel2.20 Jezebel to Sidon desh laga rajkumari thakise aru tai Israel laga raja Ahab laga maiki thakisele,aru tai pora Israel manu khan ke Baal puja kori bole bisi korise. 1 Kin. 16:29-31; 18:4, 19; 2 Kin. 9:22.  ke eku kowa nai, kun tai nijorke ekjon bhabobadi koi. Tai pora sikhai diya kotha khan Moi laga noukar khan ke bebichar kaam kori bole dibo nimite chalak kore aru murti ke puja kori kene khana kha luwa khan anikena taikhan ke khabole diye.
